titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: Mr. Cardoza moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the measure Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 188, 10 Present (Roll no. 352).

bill.summary: 5/22/2008--Introduced. Requires the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to begin an immediate investigation into the abuse of power surrounding the inaccuracies in the process and enrollment of H.R. 2419 ( Food and Energy Security Act of 2007), vetoed by the President on May 21, 2008. Admonishes the Speaker of the House, Majority Leader, and other Members of the Democratic Leadership for their roles in the events surrounding this enrollment error.
